attributes.additional_details:
Clare's Law would be a legislation that allows women to check whether their partner has a history of domestic violence. If you could find out the truth about a man before starting a serious relationship, then domestic violence issues could be deterred, avoided and even lives saved.

At least two women a week are murder...ed by their partners or ex partners and, 1 in 4 women are suffering domestic violence at present. It is acknowledged men suffer too but numbers indicate that women are the main victims and something needs to be done NOW.
